description: SquareTrade Care Plans are great value and cost up to 70% less than similar warranties you find in stores. Upon purchase, you will get an email confirmation.  Please check your SPAM folder if you have not received your contract. You will be mailed a paper contract within 7 days of purchase.  Coverage starts on day 31 or when your manufacturer coverage ends, which ever is later. Coverage is not available on products used for commercial or industrial purposes. If you have questions, please call: 1.877.WARRANTY.
title: SquareTrade One-Year Open-Box Electronics Extended Warranty - Items $200-2000
